thread.title: Cleveland Mayor Frank Jackson proposes to revive downtown fire company, hire 18 firefighters
thread.title_full: Cleveland Mayor Frank Jackson proposes to revive downtown fire company, hire 18 firefighters

author: Leila Atassi, cleveland.com
title: Cleveland Mayor Frank Jackson proposes to revive downtown fire company, hire 18 firefighters
text: Under Cleveland Mayor Frank Jackson's proposed 2017 budget, the Fire Department plans to revive a fire company that closed in 2008 amid controversy that doing so would increase response times.
